jannie.shapes

Class Rectangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • jannie.shapes.Shape
      • jannie.shapes.Rectangle

  • public class Rectangle
extends Shape
    A class that represents a circle
    Version:
    1
    Author:
    janniezhong

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class jannie.shapes.Shape

        x, y

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Rectangle()
      Creates a rectangle with the upper left corner at (0,0) with width 0 and height 0, stroke 0, in black and with a black outline (default values)
      Rectangle(double x, double y, double width, double height, int strokeWeight, java.awt.Color c, boolean hasFill, java.awt.Color s, boolean hasStroke)
      Creates a rectangle with the upper left corner at (x, y) with the specified width and height

    • Constructor Detail

      • Rectangle

        public Rectangle()
        Creates a rectangle with the upper left corner at (0,0) with width 0 and height 0, stroke 0, in black and with a black outline (default values)

      • Rectangle

        public Rectangle(double x,
                 double y,
                 double width,
                 double height,
                 int strokeWeight,
                 java.awt.Color c,
                 boolean hasFill,
                 java.awt.Color s,
                 boolean hasStroke)
        Creates a rectangle with the upper left corner at (x, y) with the specified width and height
        Parameters:
        x - The x-coordinate of the upper left corner
        y - The y-coordinate of the upper left corner
        width - The width of the rectangle
        height - The height of the rectangle
        strokeWeight - The thickness of the line that draws the rectangle
        c - color of the fill of the shape
        hasFill - whether the shape should have a fill
        s - color of the stroke of the shape
        hasStroke - whether the shape should have a stroke
